name: §d§nSleek Form
description:
The Entropy parasite has warped your body. This allows you to run faster and, if you are §esneaking§r as you land, avoid fall damage, but your maximum health is slightly decreased, you cannot use a §eShield§r, and armor and armor toughness only provide half their usual benefit. 
Your strange skin and lack of lungs provide an immunity to thorns, suffocation, Regeneration and Instant Health.
